name: Black Widow
bio: From a very young age, Natasha Romanova was trained in combat and espionage in the Russian “Black Widow Ops” program. After some years working as a femme fatale for the USSR and even fighting Iron Man on occasion, Black Widow defected to the US.  There she worked as an agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. and eventually joined the Avengers.
powers: Black Widow is an expert tactician and secret agent.  She is highly skilled in hand-to-hand combat and marksmanship, has slowed aging and an enhanced immune system. Her special gauntlets come equipped with—among other things—grappling hooks, knock-out gas and explosives.
